page.title: 18POSTAL AND SHOPPING SERVICES
page.content: There is{neither}a{shop nor}a{post {office}in this area, but Mr Kenny Foubister is the regular{post-man}for the south end. The delivery service for the area consists of{one daily delivery}from about 12 o'clock to half past one and an average of 60 letters are delivered. There is{one post-box}in the area which has a daily collection, except on Sundays. This provides a good postal service to the area. Kettletoft Stores runs a{'Mobile {Shop'}to this area{every Saturday {morning.}It arrives at Warsetter at roughly half past ten. The round of this area normally takes Fiona Slater (the van driver) about two and a half hours. There are{eleven regular {customers}for this service in the area.
